import React from 'react' import './about.css' function About() { return (

Project

Letâ€™s Buy. A platform that makes it easy to search for products

Project group

The members of our group are as follows:

  • Enock Kipkoech
  • Mwenda Murithi
  • Asher Areba

Design

This is our Requirements Specification Document, changes and update will be made as the project progress..

This is our Software Design Document, changes and update will be made as the project progress..

Project meetings

First Day (Monday)

We met up, and discussed on the ideas that we had, and finished on labs so that we could focus on the project. We also divided up the workload

Second Day (Tuesday)

We met for the whole day. Each one of us was working on our assigned parts. But we got a blocker cause of the API

Third Day (Wednesday)

We worked on the User Interface(UI) while waiting for the API issue to be resolved

Fourth Day (Thursday)

We had all finished up on our UI and we were merging it to see if it will fit. We finally got an API although it was lacking on some of the requirements we were to work on.

Project results

Here you can put link(s) to the final and/or intermediate versions of your application.

This is the browser version of Lord of the Galaxy, one of our many games.

This is the download link to the installer for the client version of Lord of the Galaxy

) } export default About
